sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import { Playground, PropsTable } from 'docz'
import List from './index';

export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"list"}}>{`List`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Ordered, un-ordered, indented, you're covered when it comes to making lists.`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __codesandbox={`undefined`} __position={0} __code={'<List>\n  <List.Item>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet</List.Item>\n  <List.Item>Consectetur adipiscing elit</List.Item>\n  <List.Item>\n    Nulla volutpat aliquam velit\n    <List>\n      <List.Item>Phasellus iaculis neque</List.Item>\n      <List.Item>Purus sodales ultricies</List.Item>\n      <List.Item>Vestibulum laoreet porttitor sem</List.Item>\n      <List.Item>Ac tristique libero volutpat at</List.Item>\n    </List>\n  </List.Item>\n  <List.Item>Faucibus porta lacus fringilla vel</List.Item>\n</List>'} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,List}}>
    <List>
        <List.Item>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet</List.Item>
        <List.Item>Consectetur adipiscing elit</List.Item>
        <List.Item>Nulla volutpat aliquam velit
            <List>
                <List.Item>Phasellus iaculis neque</List.Item>
                <List.Item>Purus sodales ultricies</List.Item>
                <List.Item>Vestibulum laoreet porttitor sem</List.Item>
                <List.Item>Ac tristique libero volutpat at</List.Item>
            </List>
        </List.Item>
        <List.Item>Faucibus porta lacus fringilla vel</List.Item>
    </List>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"ordered"}}>{`Ordered`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The `}<MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`ordered`}</MDXTag>{` prop will apply correct numbering to ordered lists and nested lists.`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __codesandbox={`undefined`} __position={1} __code={'<List ordered>\n  <List.Item>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet</List.Item>\n  <List.Item>Consectetur adipiscing elit</List.Item>\n  <List.Item>\n    Nulla volutpat aliquam velit\n    <List ordered>\n      <List.Item>Phasellus iaculis neque</List.Item>\n      <List.Item>\n        Purus sodales ultricies\n        <List ordered>\n          <List.Item>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet</List.Item>\n          <List.Item>Consectetur adipiscing elit</List.Item>\n        </List>\n      </List.Item>\n      <List.Item>Vestibulum laoreet porttitor sem</List.Item>\n      <List.Item>Ac tristique libero volutpat at</List.Item>\n    </List>\n  </List.Item>\n  <List.Item>Faucibus porta lacus fringilla vel</List.Item>\n</List>'} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,List}}>
    <List ordered>
        <List.Item>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet</List.Item>
        <List.Item>Consectetur adipiscing elit</List.Item>
        <List.Item>Nulla volutpat aliquam velit
            <List ordered>
                <List.Item>Phasellus iaculis neque</List.Item>
                <List.Item>Purus sodales ultricies
                    <List ordered>
                        <List.Item>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet</List.Item>
                        <List.Item>Consectetur adipiscing elit</List.Item>
                    </List>
                </List.Item>
                <List.Item>Vestibulum laoreet porttitor sem</List.Item>
                <List.Item>Ac tristique libero volutpat at</List.Item>
            </List>
        </List.Item>
        <List.Item>Faucibus porta lacus fringilla vel</List.Item>
    </List>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"un-styled"}}>{`Un-styled`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Applying the `}<MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`unstyled`}</MDXTag>{` prop to a List will remove the bullet points.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`You can also remove bullet points on individual Items by adding the `}<MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`unstyled`}</MDXTag>{` prop.`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __codesandbox={`undefined`} __position={2} __code={'<List unstyled>\n  <List.Item>This list is unstyled</List.Item>\n  <List.Item>Consectetur adipiscing elit</List.Item>\n  <List.Item>\n    Nulla volutpat aliquam velit\n    <List>\n      <List.Item>Phasellus iaculis neque</List.Item>\n      <List.Item>Purus sodales ultricies</List.Item>\n      <List.Item unstyled>This is an unstyled item</List.Item>\n      <List.Item>Ac tristique libero volutpat at</List.Item>\n    </List>\n  </List.Item>\n  <List.Item>Faucibus porta lacus fringilla vel</List.Item>\n</List>'} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,List}}>
    <List unstyled>
        <List.Item>This list is unstyled</List.Item>
        <List.Item>Consectetur adipiscing elit</List.Item>
        <List.Item>Nulla volutpat aliquam velit
            <List>
                <List.Item>Phasellus iaculis neque</List.Item>
                <List.Item>Purus sodales ultricies</List.Item>
                <List.Item unstyled>This is an unstyled item</List.Item>
                <List.Item>Ac tristique libero volutpat at</List.Item>
            </List>
        </List.Item>
        <List.Item>Faucibus porta lacus fringilla vel</List.Item>
    </List>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"inline"}}>{`Inline`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`To make your list items flow left to right apply the `}<MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`inline`}</MDXTag>{` prop.`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __codesandbox={`undefined`} __position={3} __code={'<List inline>\n  <List.Item>Lorem</List.Item>\n  <List.Item>ipsum</List.Item>\n  <List.Item>dolor</List.Item>\n</List>'} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,List}}>
    <List inline>
        <List.Item>Lorem</List.Item>
        <List.Item>ipsum</List.Item>
        <List.Item>dolor</List.Item>
    </List>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"properties"}}>{`Properties`}</MDXTag>
<PropsTable of={List} />
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
